BOOK YOUR TEE TIME VIEW RATES Golf Instruction Robert Whitt, PGA Kelly Plantation Head Golf Professional ​ I have been developing players of this incredible game for the past 19 years, after a successful junior and collegiate playing career. I coach players at all levels including beginners, intermediate, and advanced players of all ages. I am a class A member of the PGA of America. ​ As an alternative to teaching one method, I believe in the power of dialogue between coach and client. I pride myself on being well-versed in many methods and approaches to the golf swing, short game, and putting. It's about finding out what works for a particular person's situation, physical make up, abilities, and desired outcomes. Since everyone learns differently, it is my job to discover how to help someone learn new skills while unlearning undesirable skills that are detrimental to one's game. I use high-speed video analysis, occasional launch monitor technology, and ongoing dialogue beyond the golf lesson. ​ I have competed as a junior and collegiate player, as well as a professional. Collegiately, I played for Andrew College and the on to Florida State University where I discovered my love for understanding the golf swing and helping people improve. ​ My favorite aspect of player development is experiencing the moment when I have gone from being someone's instructor to being their coach. ​ Certifications: PGA Class A GolfTEC Certified Titleist Performance Institute Level 1 Titleist Brand Ambassador ​ For pricing, booking, and contact information, please visit my PGA profile page: ​​ ​ ​ Email Robert PGA Coach Profile KELLY PLANTATION GOLF CLUB 307 Kelly Plantation Drive Destin, Florida 32541 ​ TEE TIMES (850) 650-7600 RESTAURANT (850) 269-1120 © 2025 Kelly Plantation Golf Club. BOOK YOUR TEE TIME VIEW RATES Tournaments 2025 TOURNAMENT SCH EDULE Dates and times are subject to change. FEBRUARY 24 Honor Foundation Swing for S.O.F. Course Closed ** MARCH 9 Emerald Coast Children's Advocacy Center Course Closed ** APRIL 1–JUNE 30 2025 Match Play Series Annual Low Index APRIL 4 Tower Cup One Water Place Residents AUGUST 2 Dog Days of Summer 2-Person Teams, 6/6/6 Format SEPTEMBER 27–28 2025 Club Championship Ind. Gross & Net Divisions OCTOBER 4 2025 Fall Classic 4-Person Teams, Modified Cha Cha Cha OCTOBER 13 C.I.C. Sugar Sands Golf Classic Course Closed ** OCTOBER 18–19 2025 Annual Member-Member Flight Winners & Wildcards NOVEMBER 13–15 26th Annual Member-Guest Flight Winners & Wildcards NOVEMBER 22–23 2025 Kelly Cup Maximum of 32 Players DECEMBER 6 2025 Destin / Fort Walton Beach Winter Classic Course Closed ** Tournament dates are subject to change in the event of inclement weather or course availability. Events that are marked with (**) are organized and run by outside, non-profit organizations that are supported by the club. If you wish to participate in or register a team for these events, please contact the professional staff. 2024 MATCHPLAY TOURNAMENT CHAMPIONSHIPS VIEW BRACKETS MAKE YOUR TOURNAMENT OR OUTING A SUCCESS Kelly Plantation Golf Club offers an array of services to make your golf tournament or outing a success! ​ Bag Drop Service From the moment you and your group arrive at Kelly Plantation, our bag drop staff will be there to greet each of you in front of our Clubhouse. Our staff will assist in transferring you and your guests’ golf bags from your vehicles to your personal golf cars. Tournament Set-up Tournament preparation and set-up that is so vital to a well-organized event is exemplified by our staff. Our staff will provide scorecards, cart signs and rule sheets for your event. Golf Shop & Registration The golf shop is where each member or the leader of each group will check in. Our knowledgeable golf shop staff is eager and willing to assist any customer that would be of interest in purchasing from the extensive array of merchandise. Practice Facility You and your guests will have access to our practice facility. Before your round you may practice your game on the driving range (which has five target greens), chipping green (with practice bunkers) and a 10,000 square-foot putting green. Beverage Cart Services Beverage carts will service your group throughout the day and are fully stocked with both alcoholic and non-alcoholic refreshments as well as snacks for your enjoyment. On-course Hosts Our hosts will be on the golf course to create a memorable experience. Not only will they monitor the pace of play, but they will also provide your group with ice-cold refreshing towels to cool down with on those hot summer days. Post Round Services Our post round services include cleaning your clubs and placing them at the bag drop to be picked up. Scoring of Event At the conclusion of the round, each group will bring their scorecard to a golf professional who will be posting scores to your very own custom scoreboard. Food & Beverage After your round, relax while tallying up those scores and let us satisfy that hunger. Our friendly staff is happy to prepare a luncheon or hors d’oeuvres. We do everything from hamburgers, hot dogs and chicken wings to any of your favorite gourmet snacks. Let us provide the final touch to your round! PLAN YOUR TOURNAMENT Begin planning your Tournament, charity golf outting, or corporate event today by contacting Mercedes Lane at: mlane@kellyplantationgolf.com or (850) 650-7600 KELLY PLANTATION GOLF CLUB 307 Kelly Plantation Drive Destin, Florida 32541 ​ TEE TIMES (850) 650-7600 RESTAURANT (850) 269-1120 © 2025 Kelly Plantation Golf Club.
